sets.title: QBLOX-18: Start Exploring
sets.description: 18 cubes in 9 colors. Perfect for solo play, small groups, or discovering what Qblox can do. Build your first towers, explore balance, and see where curiosity leads.

sets.title: QBLOX-27: Uncover Full Potential
sets.description: 27 cubes with 3 of each color. More pieces unlock taller structures, intricate patterns, and the complete range of what Qblox can create. Ideal for families and classrooms.
